DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine feasibility , acceptability , preliminary efficacy community home-based preschool obesity intervention family enrol Special Supplemental Nutrition Program Women , Infants , Children ( WIC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Preschool Obesity Intervention Families Enrolled WIC
DOC.detailed_description: Very study target weight control preschooler even though prevalence overweight exceed 20 % age-group past decade . Also concern study focus preschooler low-socioeconomic ( SES ) background despite persistent obesity-related socioeconomic disparity . Family-based , behavioral intervention appear promise model treatment obesity early childhood . However , dissemination potential program unclear primarily test family middle-to-upper class background within research setting . Identifying effective approach weight control preschooler low-SES background deliver community setting imperative reduce pediatric obesity epidemic . The propose study begin address critical gap complete second phase develop community-based preschool weight control intervention family enrol Special Supplemental Nutrition Program Women , Infants , Children ( WIC ) . The propose study significant specifically target preschool weight control high-risk population delivery program within WIC program conducive dissemination . Based upon formative work , exist preschool obesity program , develop 14-session , family-based preschool weight control intervention ( FBWC ) emphasize experiential learning deliver WIC home setting . Seventy-two overweight obese preschool-caregiver dyad randomize 2:1 ratio receive FBWC continue standard care WIC ( WSOC ) . The primary study aim ) examine feasibility acceptability FBWC b ) explore preliminary efficacy FBWC compare WSOC reduction preschooler BMI-z-score caregiver BMI baseline post-treatment ( 4-months ) 7-months ( 3-month follow-up ) . An exploratory aim evaluate lifestyle behavioral indicator intervention success . This study innovative : 1 ) study examine obesity intervention preschooler , 2 ) target weight control high-risk group underrepresented preschool obesity treatment outcome literature , 3 ) intervention community-based , 4 ) emphasize experiential learn strategy achieve lifestyle behavior change weight control .
